name: Empire of Devil
description:
Empire of Devil is a sandbox style real-time strategy game set in a medieval era. Build your empire, use economic, military, and political power to amass influence.


Epic Battle

Command vast armies on the battlefield. Put your skills to the test as you control thousands of men clashing in epic battles.

Siege Battles

Besiege castles with siege engines.

War Tactics
Tactics creator gives player freedom to form his own tactics to beat enemies.

Diplomacy
Engage in diplomacy, with consequences that impact the world. Your empire's future relies on your ability to adapt to the ever-changing conditions in world politics. Strike trade deals to arrange marriages to make new Alliance.

Weather
Dynamic weather system affects the result of battle from fog affects archers’ range of fire to heavy rain affect movement speed of units.

Tactical Decisions
The real-time simulating world allows from thrilling night battles to getting enforcement from the nearby unit in the battle.

Roleplaying Gameplay
The game allows a player range of role-playing element from marrying to have a child.
